segments.text: I notice the boy is really determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on that stool like it's a mountain he needs to conquer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl is eagerly waiting for her turn, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's trying to be patient, but it's hard when cookies are involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just going about her business, drying those dishes like nothing else is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows the kids are up to something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, creating a little waterfall onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't slip on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really balancing precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems so innocent, just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a silent movie with all this action happening at once.
segments.speaker: PAR
